generated_body: The article is likely to report on the tragic incident involving a freshman at San Diego State University who was injured in a fraternity-related event and subsequently died. Readers may expect details regarding the circumstances surrounding the incident, including any statements from university officials, fraternity representatives, or law enforcement. The article could also explore the implications of this event on campus safety and fraternity culture, as well as any reactions from fellow students or the broader community. Additionally, there may be information on ongoing investigations or discussions about potential policy changes related to fraternity activities.
